page.title: 02Hotels in Glenisla.
page.content: There are two hotels in Glenisla.The Kirkside has five bedrooms for the public and two for the family who own the hotel. They provide bar snacks and most meals. The busiest time of the year is New year and Easter. Their quietest time is summer. There are four full time workers. There is one bar used by the locals all year round. The hotel was built in 1705 and was originally a manse.The Kirkton hotel is on the other side of the road.It has seven bedrooms.They serve bar lunches,high teas and late suppers. There is one bar used by the locals all year round.Their busiest time of the year is July and August and their quietest month is January. There are seven members of staff.It is popular in the summer for their pony trekking which is organised by the owners.
